author: GlaucusResearch
content: Glaucus Research issues rebuttal to Asia Plastic Recycling (TWSE: 1337) and maintains Strong Sell rating.#glaucus https://t.co/Usf5XIPMpf

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that APR’s response is unsatisfactory and fails to address the publicly available independent evidence presented in our report.
